definition: Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan

sentences.english: This is all but the revival of Alexandrian thought.
sentences.chinese: 這是所有的，但復興亞歷山大思想。

sentences.english: This paper is based on the project of the huge shield tunnel a cross the Huangpu River, linking East Fuxing Road in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 以上海復興東路大型越江盾構隧道爲工程背景。

sentences.english: I live at 168 South Fuxingmen Street.
sentences.chinese: 復興門南大街一六八號。

sentences.english: A resurgent China will be problematical in a number of ways.
sentences.chinese: 一個復興的中國肯定會有很多方面出問題。

sentences.english: The World Bank's full name is the International Bank for Reco truction and Development.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行的全稱是國際復興與開發銀行。

sentences.english: Shen Yinmo is closely related to the revival of modern Chinese calligraphic culture.
sentences.chinese: 沈尹默與現代中國書法文化復興是緊密相聯的。

sentences.english: Christopher Marlowe is one of the outstanding representatives of English Renaissance dramatists.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托弗馬洛是文藝復興時期英國戲劇的傑出代表。

sentences.english: That Later Renaissance is a complicated historical term. W. J.
sentences.chinese: 後期文藝復興是一個比較複雜的史學概念。

sentences.english: Would it be possible to rebuild and perhaps restore Cybertron to its former glory?
sentences.chinese: 塞伯坦能夠得以重建，復興昔日的輝煌嗎？

sentences.english: At first the artists of the Renaissance only had single-point perspective.
sentences.chinese: 一開始，文藝復興時期的畫家們只會運用單點透視。

sentences.english: Neoplatonism was one of the important thoughts of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 新柏拉圖主義是文藝復興時期重要思想之一。

sentences.english: Yan felt that the first step should be a 'national rejuvenation' policy.
sentences.chinese: 閻的觀點是中國第一步應該採取“民族復興”政策。

sentences.english: Russi a's sense of resurgence is mixed with a deeply rooted inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 復興俄羅斯的感情混合着一種根深蒂固的自卑感。

sentences.english: The Renaissance and Humanism: Humanism is the key-note of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 文藝復興，提倡理性，人文主義。

sentences.english: The QING Dynasty was the era of literature renaissance in Heluo Area.
sentences.chinese: 清代爲河洛地區文學的復興時期。

sentences.english: Revive Wuhan, be person of 60 million Hubei expect.
sentences.chinese: 復興武漢，是六千萬湖北人的期盼。
